services.title: Vibrant Color Selection
services.desc: Customize these three sections to showcase your paint products. To duplicate, delete, or move sections, select the section and use the top icons to perform your action.

services.title: Eco-Friendly Paints
services.desc: To add a fourth section, reduce the size of these three sections using the right icon of each block.Then, duplicate one of the sections to create a new one as a copy.
